trans-unit.source: Allows users to control class loading and mandate what class to load.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用者控制類別的載入，並且託管要載入的類別。

trans-unit.source: During serialization, a formatter transmits the information required to create an instance of an object of the correct type and version.
trans-unit.target: 在序列化期間，格式器會傳輸在建立正確型別和版本之物件執行個體時的必要資訊。

trans-unit.source: This information generally includes the full type name and assembly name of the object.
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊通常包含物件的完整型別名稱和組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The assembly name includes the name, version, and strong name (see [Strong-Named Assemblies](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md)) hash of the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 組件名稱包括名稱、 版本和強式名稱 (請參閱[強式名稱組件](~/docs/framework/app-domains/strong-named-assemblies.md)) 的組件的雜湊。

trans-unit.source: By default, deserialization uses this information to create an instance of an identical object (with the exception of any assembly loading restricted by the security policy).
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，還原序列化會使用此資訊建立相同物件的執行個體 (使用安全性原則所限制之任何組件載入的例外狀況)。

trans-unit.source: Some users need to control which class to load, either because the class has moved between assemblies or a different version of the class is required on the server and client.
trans-unit.target: 由於類別已經在組件之間移動，或在伺服器和用戶端上需要不同版本的類別，因此某些使用者需要控制載入哪一個類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder> can also be used for security.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder> 也可以使用的安全性。

trans-unit.source: There might be some security exploits when you are trying to deserialize some data from an untrusted source.
trans-unit.target: 當您嘗試還原序列化某些不受信任來源的資料時，則可能是有些安全性漏洞。

trans-unit.source: The binder gives you an opportunity to inspect what types are being loaded in your application domain.
trans-unit.target: 繫結器可讓您檢查應用程式定義域中載入哪些類型的機會。

trans-unit.source: You can then either maintain list of denied types or a list of allowed types and restrict which types are being loaded and instantiated.
trans-unit.target: 接著，請維護拒絕類型的清單或允許類型清單，並限制正在載入哪些類型和具現化。

trans-unit.source: In addition you should be mindful of what information is being put out on the wire, you may want to secure (use transport or message security) when sending type names or other data on the wire.
trans-unit.target: 此外，您應該要注意哪些資訊在網路上放置，您可能想要保護 （使用傳輸或訊息安全性） 在網路上傳送的型別名稱或其他資料時。

trans-unit.source: Only use <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder> if you are completely sure of what information is being serialized.
trans-unit.target: 只使用<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder>如果您完全確定的序列化資訊。

trans-unit.source: Malicious types can cause unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 惡意型別可能會導致非預期的行為。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract base class.
trans-unit.target: 這是個抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: All binders extend this class.
trans-unit.target: 所有繫結器延伸此類別。

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder" />, you must override the following member: <see cref="M:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder.BindToType(System.String,System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 當您從 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder" /> 繼承時，必須覆寫下列成員：<see cref="M:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder.BindToType(System.String,System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationBinder" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The type of the object the formatter creates a new instance of.
trans-unit.target: 格式子建立新執行個體之物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> name of the serialized object.
trans-unit.target: 指定序列化物件的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> name of the serialized object.
trans-unit.target: 指定序列化物件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 名稱。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, controls the binding of a serialized object to a type.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，控制序列化物件與類型的繫結。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> name of the serialized object.
trans-unit.target: 指定序列化物件的 <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> 名稱。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Type" /> name of the serialized object.
trans-unit.target: 指定序列化物件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 名稱。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, controls the binding of a serialized object to a type.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，控制序列化物件與類型的繫結。

trans-unit.source: The type of the object the formatter creates a new instance of.
trans-unit.target: 格式子建立新執行個體之物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: SerializationBinder Example#1
trans-unit.target: SerializationBinder 範例 #1

trans-unit.source: You must implement the current method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 您必須在衍生類別中實作目前的方法。
